page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: THE HALL IN THE MIDDLE BETWEEN THE G.P ROOM AND THE DINING ROOM IS USED FOR PHYSICAL EDUCATION, DRAMA, GAMES AND ASSEMBLIES AND ANY CONCERTS OR PARTIES. UPSTAIRS IS THE T.V., COMPUTER, FILM ROOM AND AT THE OPPOSITE END OF THE SCHOOL IS THE HEADTEACHERS STAFF ROOM RECENTLY REOPENED AND DECORATED.THERE ARE MANY VISITING TEACHERS E.G. FABRIC CRAFT , ART, MUSIC, P.E. WHO COME. THROUGHOUT THE SESSION FOR A LIMITED TIME. REV.R CLARKSON SCHOOL CHAPLAIN CONDUCTS SERVICES OFTEN DURING THE SESSION AND ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS. THE PUPILS ALSO VISIT THE LEISURE CENTRE FOR SWIMMING AND WARD.RD.DUNDEE GYMNASIUM FOR GAMES SKILLS. THROUGHOUT THE SESSION VARIOUS TRIPS ARE ORGANISED TO PLACES OF INTEREST.THESE TIE IN WITH ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES AND ARE PART OF PROJECT WORK.
